title: Jana Small Finance Bank Hikes Interest Rates On FDs By 25 Bps (W.e.f. 5th May 2022) - Goodreturns
content: Jana Small Finance Bank Hikes Interest Rates On FDs By 25 Bps (W.e.f. 5th May 2022)  Goodreturns
description: On domestic fixed deposits of less than Rs 2 crore, the DICGC-insured Jana Small Finance Bank has raised interest rates by 25 basis points. The announcement has been published today, May 5th, 2022, and the bank has raised interest rates on deposits maturing in three to five years from 6.75 per cent to 7% as a result of the modification. The bank has kept the interest rates on the remaining tenors
